long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Surf the web online and be secure with the fastest VPN proxy extension for Chrome. Mask your location, access locked websites, keep hackers at bay and manage your ExtremeVPN app from anywhere.

What is a VPN Chrome Extension?

A VPN for Google Chrome is the best way to get a safe and secure browsing experience directly from Chrome. It seamlessly integrates with your Chrome browser, and it benefits you like a regular VPN app.

The only difference is you don’t need to open the ExtremeVPN app on your device but rather on Chrome browser as an extension. Install our VPN extension on Google Chrome and protect your sensitive data while enjoying internet freedom.

Why You Should Get ExtremeVPN’s VPN Extension for Chrome?

- To guard your internet traffic from snoopers
- To deactivate WebRTC and prevent leaks
- For online security and privacy
- To conceal your IP address and location
- To unblock geo-blocked content globally

Why Does ExtremeVPN Stand Out as the Best VPN for Chrome?

✔️ Best-in-class Encryption and Security
ExtremeVPN offers elite-level security for its users. Our robust VPN servers and 256-bit AES encryption are what make us the best Chrome VPN extension today. These features protect users from cyber threats and hackers and help them achieve the best privacy online.

✔️ Enhanced Privacy at All Times
Hide your IP address with a single click with ExtremeVPN’s Chrome extension. You will get a new IP address different from your real one so that no one can see what you're doing when connected to the internet.

✔️ Fast VPN Network
One prime feature of our Chrome browser extension is the fast speed we attain because of our widespread server network. Choose from our 6500+ servers from over 78 countries worldwide, and you’ll be connected in no time.

✔️ Easy to Setup
No extra requirements are needed. Just download, sign up, and connect. Our VPN browser extension is user-friendly, and it only takes a click for you to encrypt your browser traffic and data.

✔️ No Data Caps or Limitations
ExtremeVPN’s browser VPN offers unlimited bandwidth and never restricts or disturbs your web browsing. You can securely stream popular titles or shows from anywhere without any limits.

✔️ A Name of Trust
There are many free VPN Chrome extensions available on the internet, and all of them come in different shapes and forms. However, not every software is what you should trust. ExtremeVPN’s proxy extension provides a safe, fast, and unrestricted connection so you can enjoy the full internet experience with peace of mind.

✔️ Strict No-logs Policy
ExtremeVPN prioritizes user privacy and security, and we don’t collect or store any of your activities or data. Our extension ensures that whatever you do online must be limited only to you.

✔️ Compatibility with Devices
Our extension works perfectly with all devices having a Chrome browser, including Windows, Mac, or Chromebook. So whether you’re using a laptop, mobile, tab, or PC, you can get ultimate VPN protection from anywhere.

✔️ 5-star Customer Support
Get immediate answers to your queries. Connect us via email, or live chat and ask us anything, anytime. Our customer support team is available to assist you 24/7.

✔️ Security on the Go
No matter where you're, using public Wi-fi, or private connection, ExtremeVPN offers VPN solution for all networks.

What are the Features that ExtremeVPN’s VPN Proxy Extension Offers? 

✔️ 58+ Locations Worldwide
The ExtremeVPN’s extension comes with 3200+ VPN locations optimized for faster speeds that allow you to connect from 58 countries globally. Just select your desired country server and it will change your IP address within seconds.

✔️ WebRTC Leak Protection
WebRTC is a technology that facilitates real-time communication between browsers. However, it can leak the IP of users. Our proxy for Chrome disables WebRTC and prevents your IP from falling into the wrong hands.

✔️ Wide Language Selection
Our website is available in 5 different languages. You can switch to any language you want to get the best online experience.

✔️ Bypass Proxy Feature
Bypass proxy is a built-in VPN technology that makes your browsing experience convenient and effortless. Our secure VPN proxy service protects your privacy online while allowing you to disable VPN traffic on specific websites of your choice.

How Can I Set Up a VPN on Chrome?

It’s easy. Just follow the steps, and you’re good to go:

1. Go to the Chrome web store and download the ExtremeVPN app by pressing the “Add to Chrome” button.
2. Get a VPN subscription.
3. Sign in to your ExtremeVPN account.
4. Select “Country,” and you will be connected to the VPN.
5. Enjoy a secure and private VPN connection.

Unlike free VPNs, ExtemeVPN is a premium VPN service offering advanced features. However, you can test all of our features using a free VPN extension trial that we offer. This VPN trial is available on Android devices and Apple iPhone, and a single account works on all devices and platforms.
